item.title: 美国冻结援助有可能将北京后院的影响力拱手让给中国
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的政府在一月份冻结了对柬埔寨最大的排雷组织的捐款，该组织致力于清除华盛顿过去在东南亚战争中留下的致命残留物，在此之后，该组织宣布了新的资金来源--来自中国。【原文：After U.S. President Donald Trump's administration froze donations in January to Cambodia's largest demining organization, which works to clear the countryside of deadly remnants of Washington's past wars in Southeast Asia, the group announced new funding - from China.】

item.title: 消息人士称，中国泡沫红茶公司密雪将于二月晚些时候在香港首次公开募股，融资约 5 亿美元
item.description: 据三位直接知情人士透露，中国最大的泡沫红茶公司密雪集团将于 2 月底开始在香港首次公开募股的簿记工作，以筹集约 5 亿美元资金。【原文：China's largest bubble tea firm, Mixue Group, will begin bookbuilding for its Hong Kong initial public offering by the end of February to raise about $500 million, according to three sources with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 特鲁多表示，加拿大将在必要时对 "不可接受的 "美国关税做出坚决有力的回应
item.description: 加拿大总理贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）周二表示，加拿大将努力强调美国征收钢铝关税的负面影响，如有必要，加拿大的回应将是坚定而明确的。【原文：Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau said on Tuesday that Canada would seek to highlight the negative impact of the United States' steel and aluminium tariffs and that - if needed - the response from Canada would be firm and clear.】

item.title: 特朗普金属关税推动黄金上涨，施压中国钢铁股
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对钢铁和铝征收 25% 的关税，使黄金在贸易冲突扩大和通胀忧虑的影响下屡创新高，而一些国家则对谈判抱有希望，中国钢铁企业股价承压。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's 25% tariffs on steel and aluminium sent gold to record highs on worries of widening trade conflict and inflation, while some countries held out hope for negotiations and Chinese steel firm shares came under pressure.】

item.title: 1 月份中国汽车销量创近一年最大降幅
item.description: 中国 1 月份的汽车销量同比下降了 12%，这是自 9 月份以来的首次下降，也是近一年来的最大降幅，因为汽车制造商们都在为全球最大汽车市场的激烈竞争做准备。【原文：China's car sales fell 12% in January from a year earlier, the first decline since September and the biggest drop in almost a year, as automakers braced for intense competition in the world's largest auto market.】

item.title: DP World 首席执行官：特朗普希望美国开放其他市场
item.description: 迪拜港口和物流公司DP World首席执行官苏丹-艾哈迈德-本-苏拉耶姆（Sultan Ahmed bin Sulayem）周二表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）希望，如果美国开放，其他市场也能开放。【原文：Dubai-owned ports and logistics company DP World's CEO Sultan Ahmed bin Sulayem said on Tuesday U.S. President Donald Trump expects other markets to be open if the United States is.】

item.title: 受中国关税影响，美国对印度的煤炭出口预计将增加
item.description: 五位行业官员表示，在中国对从美国进口的能源征收关税后，预计美国将增加对印度的煤炭出口，这可能会侵蚀澳大利亚和俄罗斯在印度市场的份额。【原文：The United States is expected to boost coal exports to India after China imposed tariffs on energy imports from the U.S., five industry officials said, potentially eroding Australia and Russia's market shares in the Indian market.】

item.title: 百度首席执行官称，尽管 DeepSeek 取得了成功，但仍需增加人工智能投入
item.description: 百度首席执行官李彦宏周二表示，尽管 DeepSeek 对大型人工智能模型的成本效益提出了挑战，但仍需要对数据中心和云基础设施进行投资。【原文：Investment in data centres and cloud infrastructure is still needed despite DeepSeek challenging the cost efficiency of large AI models, Baidu CEO Robin Li said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚麦格理与美国主要银行一道退出全球气候联盟
item.description: 澳大利亚麦格理集团（Macquarie Group）周二表示，将退出净零银行联盟（NZBA）。【原文：Australia's Macquarie Group said on Tuesday it is exiting the Net Zero Banking Alliance (NZBA), a group of global banks aiming to align their operations with net-zero greenhouse gas emissions by 2050.】

item.title: 韩联社报道：韩国法院驳回汇丰银行违反卖空规定的指控
item.description: 据韩联社报道，韩国一家法院周二宣判汇丰银行违反该国卖空规定的指控不成立。【原文：A South Korean court on Tuesday acquitted HSBC on charges of violating the country's short-selling rules, the Yonhap News Agency reported.】

item.title: 法国工业部长表示，欧洲应坚定一致地应对美国关税措施
item.description: 法国工业部长马克-费拉齐（Marc Ferracci）周二表示，欧洲应该以坚定和团结的方式应对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的最新关税措施。【原文：Europe should respond in a firm and united manner to U.S. President Donald Trump's latest tariffs, French industry minister Marc Ferracci said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 英国石油公司季度盈利创四年新低，炼油业务利润率疲软
item.description: 周二，英国石油公司（BP）第四季度利润降至 11.7 亿美元，创下了这家石油巨头四年来的最低收益，原因是其炼油业务利润率疲软。【原文：BP's fourth-quarter profit fell to $1.17 billion on Tuesday, marking the lowest earnings for the oil major in four years as weak margins dented its refining business.】

item.title: Gucci 销售持续低迷，Kering 寻找新设计师
item.description: 法国奢侈品集团开云集团（Kering）周二公布，受旗下意大利品牌古驰（Gucci）拖累，第四季度销售额下降了12%，但在主要市场中国和美国的销售略有好转。【原文：French luxury group Kering reported a 12% drop in fourth quarter sales on Tuesday, dragged lower by its Italian brand Gucci, but flagged a slight improvement in major markets China and the United States.】

item.title: 诺华同意以不超过 31 亿美元的价格收购 Anthos
item.description: 瑞士制药巨头诺华公司周二表示，已同意以不超过 31 亿美元的价格收购生物制药公司 Anthos Therapeutics。【原文：Swiss pharmaceutical giant Novartis said on Tuesday it has agreed to acquire biopharma firm Anthos Therapeutics for up to $3.1 billion.】

item.title: 联合信贷银行誓言 2025 年利润保持稳定，并提高派息率
item.description: 联合信贷银行周二公布的 2024 年盈利好于预期，并表示尽管利率下降，但今年的目标是保持利润稳定，并承诺在 2025-2027 年增加股东回报。【原文：UniCredit on Tuesday posted better than expected 2024 earnings and said it aimed to keep profit stable this year despite declining rates, promising to increase shareholder rewards in 2025-2027.】

item.title: 加拿大道明银行将以每股 79.25 美元的价格出售嘉信理财股份
item.description: 加拿大多伦多道明银行周二表示，将以每股 79.25 美元的价格出售 1.654 亿股嘉信理财股票。【原文：Canada's Toronto-Dominion Bank said on Tuesday it would sell 165.4 million shares in Charles Schwab for $79.25 per share.】

item.title: 高盛称中国是对冲基金今年购物清单上的首选
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）在一份报告中说，全球对冲基金今年大部分时间都在抢购中国股票，过去一周，随着本土人工智能初创公司 DeepSeek 的崛起，投资者的热情高涨，对冲基金的买入速度也在加快。【原文：Global hedge funds have been snapping up Chinese stocks for much of this year, with their buying accelerating in the past week as the emergence of homegrown artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek fueled investor enthusiasm, Goldman Sachs said in a note.】

item.title: 早间竞标：关于贸易战和（电动汽车）价格战
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 特朗普征收新关税增加出口不确定性，中国钢铁企业股价下滑
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）新征收的关税激起了人们对今年钢铁出口可能受到影响的担忧，中国第一大钢铁生产国的主要上市钢铁公司股价周二下滑。【原文：Shares at major listed steelmakers in top producer China slid on Tuesday as fresh tariffs by U.S. President Donald Trump stoked concerns over possible impact on steel exports this year.】

item.title: 中国万科从国有股东处获得 3.83 亿美元贷款
item.description: 资金紧张的中国万科表示，其大股东、国有企业深圳地铁公司将向其提供 28 亿元人民币（3.8312 亿美元）贷款，这表明政府正在加大力度稳定这家房地产开发商。【原文：Cash-strapped China Vanke said its major shareholder, state-owned Shenzhen Metro, is giving it a 2.8 billion yuan ($383.12 million) loan, in a sign the government is stepping up efforts to stabilise the property developer.】

item.title: 欧洲期待在巴黎峰会第二天拥抱人工智能，但全球共识尚不明确
item.description: 周二，世界各国领导人齐聚一堂，参加人工智能巴黎峰会第二天的全体会议，但美国是否愿意签署一份支持可持续人工智能的声明仍是个问题。【原文：World leaders gathered on Tuesday for the second day and plenary session of the Paris summit on artificial intelligence, as U.S. willingness to sign onto a statement championing sustainable AI remained in question.】

item.title: 据《信息报》报道，OpenAI 首席执行官称董事会将拒绝马斯克 970 亿美元的收购要约
item.description: 据《信息报》周一报道，OpenAI 首席执行官山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）在一条信息中告诉员工，公司董事会打算明确表示对埃隆-马斯克的 "所谓出价 "不感兴趣。【原文：OpenAI CEO Sam Altman told staff in a message that the company's board of directors intends to make clear it has no interest in Elon Musk's "supposed bid", the Information reported on Monday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，中国 CATL 计划本周提交香港上市申请，以筹集至少 50 亿美元资金
item.description: 据两位直接知情人士透露，中国电池巨头 CATL 计划本周提交香港上市申请，以筹集至少 50 亿美元资金。【原文：Chinese battery giant CATL plans to file its Hong Kong listing application to raise at least $5 billion this week, according to two sources with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 官员称香港将就美国关税向世贸组织投诉
item.description: 香港特区政府政务司司长陈家强周二表示，香港将就美国最近对香港征收关税一事向世界贸易组织提出申诉，声称美国完全无视香港作为独立关税区的地位。【原文：Hong Kong will file a complaint on recent U.S. tariffs imposed on the city to the World Trade Organization, claiming the U.S. has completely ignored the city's status as a separate customs territory, chief secretary Eric Chan said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 新朋、吉利汽车股价下跌，因担心比亚迪推进智能驾驶
item.description: 周二，中国汽车制造商新鹏汽车和吉利汽车股价暴跌，原因是担心它们将难以与比亚迪竞争，比亚迪几乎全线免费提供智能驾驶功能。【原文：Shares in Chinese automakers Xpeng and Geely Auto tumbled on Tuesday on worries that they will struggle to compete against BYD's move to offer smart driving features across almost all of its line-up for free.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，激进主义者埃利奥特持有菲利普斯 66 公司超过 25 亿美元的股份
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周一报道，激进主义者埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）已持有菲利普斯 66 超过 25 亿美元的股份，并计划推动这家炼油企业考虑进行运营变革，以提振其股价。【原文：Activist Elliott Investment Management has built an over $2.5 billion stake in Phillips 66 and plans to push the oil refiner to consider operational changes to boost its stock price, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday.】

item.title: 投资者消化美国新的钢铝关税政策，石油价格持稳
item.description: 油价周二持稳，交易商正在消化新一轮贸易关税，这次是对美国进口的所有钢铁和铝征收25%的关税，这可能会对全球最大石油消费国的全球经济和能源需求造成压力。【原文：Oil prices were steady on Tuesday as traders digested another round of trade tariffs, this time a 25% levy on all U.S. imports of steel and aluminium, which could weigh on global economic and energy demand in the world's biggest oil consumer.】

item.title: 新华社：特斯拉上海巨型电池组工厂投产
item.description: 中国官方通讯社新华社称，特斯拉位于上海的特大型电池工厂已于周二投产。【原文：Tesla's battery megafactory in Shanghai, for manufacturing its megapack batteries, has launched production on Tuesday, Chinese official news agency Xinhua said.】

item.title: 最新关税举措支撑美元；关注鲍威尔和美国通胀
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普大幅提高钢铝进口关税，并表示将在未来几天宣布对其他国家征收对等关税的计划后，美元周二走强。【原文：The dollar firmed on Tuesday after U.S. President Donald Trump moved to substantially raise tariffs on steel and aluminium imports and said he would announce plans to impose reciprocal tariffs on other countries over the coming days.】

item.title: 贝恩资本称可能撤回对富士软的要约收购提案
item.description: 美国私募股权公司贝恩资本（Bain Capital）表示，可能会撤回其对日本 IT 公司富士软（Fuji Soft）的要约收购提案，因为在一场旷日持久的竞购战中，竞争对手 KKR 将报价提高到了贝恩的报价之上。【原文：U.S. private equity firm Bain Capital said it may withdraw its tender offer proposal for Japanese IT firm Fuji Soft , after rival suitor KKR raised its offer above Bain's in a protracted bidding war.】
